<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/kyc/{profile}/research"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is called to research kyc.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"profile","description":"kyc profile to research","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"PaymentRequest","required":["entityType","clientRequestId"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"Unique identifier provided by the client. Can be used in response corelation.","type":"string"},"taxId":{"description":"Tax Identification - CPF (11 digits formatted) or CNPJ (14 digits formatted), fill with zeros left of the number if necessary.","type":"string"},"entityType":{"description":"Person or Organization","enum":["Person","Organization"],"type":"string"},"name":{"description":"Name to research (optional, depends on KYC Profile)","type":"string"},"birthDate":{"description":"Birth Date to research formated \"yyyy-MM-dd\" (optional, depends on KYC Profile)","type":"string"},"countries":{"description":"Array of alias Coutries to research (optional, depends on KYC Profile)","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"stateCourts":{"description":"Array of alias State Courts to research (optional, depends on KYC Profile)","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"federalCourts":{"description":"Array of alias Federal Courts to research (optional, depends on KYC Profile)","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"example":{"clientRequestId":"f19a5fcb-7a98-4b3d-bba5-8b80a5a9437c","taxId":"12345678901","entityType":"Person","name":"some name","birthDate":"1990-01-01T00:00:00.000Z","countries":["BRASIL","CHILE"],"stateCourts":["RJ","SP"],"federalCourts":["TRF-1","TRF-2"]}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
